content: hemenway is worked from the top down with an easy to memorize two row knit and purl pattern this is a stretchy pattern so it will fit a variety of feet the pattern includes an eye of partridge heel flap and traditional gusset this pattern was knit and designed in a speckle yarn but would also look excellent with self-striping or your favorite but sometimes hard to knit variegated yarn if you are looking for a pattern specifically designed for self-striping patterns take a look at my designing profile for my self-striping summer series please tag @allknitup on instagram i would love to see your projects out in the wild #allknitupdesigns #allknitup if you have any questions or just want to share join us at the all knit up designs ravelry group 1 happy knitting sierra 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/all-knit-up-designs
